page.title: 10SHOPPING IN BORROWASH
page.content: The largest shop in {BORROWASH}is{ {GRANDWAYS SUPERMARKET.}The shop has a ground floor area of 15,ooo square feet and an upstairs storage area of 7,000 square feet.It has been open ten years having replaced some cottages and the old {FORESTERS}pub.The shop stocks about 7,500 items and employs 68 people.It serves about 10,000 customers each week.The shop is stocked, via computer order, every Monday and Wednesday mainly from its warehouse on Humberside. {COLLYERS NURSERY}is also very popular.The business has been in existence since 1938 on its present half acre site.They specialize in outdoor hardy plants including species from Japan,New Zealand,Belgium,Germany and Holland.All the plants are grown in pots and the annual turnover is about one million plants.
